subject: Email Marketing Trial - Don't lose your marketing edge
body:
Time Flies...















Your trial may be over, but your customers still want to hear from you!














					User Name: billcampus
					Dear Bill Campus,
Yes, it's true.  Your Email Marketing free trial has ended! We hope you took full advantage of your trial to reach out to your customers or members. Now we would like you to become our customer. 
Option 1: Buy Constant Contact.					
                    Monthly plans start at just $15/month for up to 500 email addresses.  Just login to your account and go to My Account>Pay for Products to continue enjoying the benefits of Constant Contact. 



Option 2: Grow your list.

					Even though your trial is over, you can still grow your list by capturing website visitors using the Constant Contact's Visitor Signup Box.  In fact, you can do just about everything in your Constant Contact account except send emails. If you haven't already added the signup box to your website, login and go to My Settings>Site Visitor Signup. 
Once you are ready to connect with your customers, give one of our Communication Consultants a call. They're here to help you! 














Questions? Please give us a call!
US / Canada Toll Free: 1-866-876-8464
Outside US / Canada: 1-781-472-8140
